```{r setup}
# install()
library(bis620.2023)
library(lubridate)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)

data(accel)
t1 = accel$time[5000]
accel |> 
  filter((time >= t1) & (time <= t1 + minutes(5))) |>
  spec_sig(take_log = TRUE) |>
  filter(freq <= 3) |>
  plot_accel(x_var = "freq") +
    theme_bw()
  
```
